name: KLM Asia 777-306ER [PH-BVC] Close Up Taxi and Takeoff from Calgary
description:
Whoa. So that's what a 777-300ER looks like from here ;) Seriously though, this plane is GIGANTIC! I was zoomed out all the way and still couldn't fit the entire plane in the frame, as you'll see in the video. Such an impressive sight! Sorry for all the shakiness on the takeoff, the wind decided to pick up :/ It was just awesome to see one of KLM's 77Ws here, hopefully we get another equipment change sometime! I hope you guys enjoy, and watch in 1080p!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

Aircraft: Boeing 777-300ER
Aircraft Name: Nationaal Park Sian Ka'an
Engines: 2x GE-90-115B
Registration: PH-BVC
Route: YYC-AMS
Callsign: KLM 678 Heavy
Runway used: 35R
Taxiway(s) used: H, G, F, R, B
